CustomField.formula: If(Total_Sales_Meetings_Completed__c <=3.4 ,'Needs Improvement', If(Total_Sales_Meetings_Completed__c >3.4 && Total_Sales_Meetings_Completed__c <=4.4 ,'Meets Expectations', If(Total_Sales_Meetings_Completed__c >=4.5,'Exceeds Expectations', null )))
CustomField.label: Rating - Total Sales Meetings Completed
